role.argrole: entity arg1 is made to be

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (NP-ADV (DP (DT 每) (CLP (M 个))) (NP (NN 月))) (ADVP (AD 并)) (VP (VV 订有) (QP-OBJ (CD 一) (CLP (M 天))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (NP (NN 废纸) (NN 回收)) (NP (NN 日))))))))
